mapper.select: select board_category, (round((select count(board_process) from user_board where board_process = '완료' and pj_num = #{pjNum})/ (select count(board_process) from user_board where pj_num = #{pjNum}) * 100) ) progress from user_board where pj_num = #{pjNum} group by board_category

select u.user_name , (round(((select count(b.board_process) from user_board b where b.board_writer = u.user_id and b.board_process = '완료' and b.pj_num=#{pjNum} ) / (select count(b.board_process) from user_board b where b.board_writer = u.user_id and b.pj_num=#{pjNum}) )*100)) progress from user_user u left join mapping m on u.user_id = m.user_id where m.pj_num = #{pjNum}

select board_category, (round((select count(board_process) from user_board where board_process = '완료' and pj_num = #{pjNum} and board_writer = #{userId} )/ (select count(board_process) from user_board where pj_num = #{pjNum} and board_writer = #{userId}) * 100) ) progress from user_board where pj_num = #{pjNum} and board_writer = #{userId} group by board_category
